## Introduction to TextPredictor

TextPredictor is a Shiny app  that can be used to predict the next word when a user enters some text. TextPredictor uses data sets obtained from blogs, news and tweets to predict the next word. 

## User Guide
Please enter a text in the "TextPredictor" tab and press "Submit" button.
The next predicted word will appear in the main panel
